pandae667 wrote:
>
> Hi,
>
> its me once again. I need a little clarification.
> The filters I can add to an extract-processor - are those applied
> _before_ applying the extractors (so i can say to what URIs I want the
> extractor to apply) or are those applied _after_ extraction (so I can
> define what I want to have extracted).
>














For Extractors, added filters are run first to determine whether the 
Extractor should be called.  See 
http://crawler.archive.org/xref/org/archive/crawler/framework/Processor.html#89.   
See how at line #102, filters are run before we call 'innerProcess' 
(which in turn calls Extractor#extract).

If you want to filter URIs extracted, make amendment to your Scope so 
that only the wanted URIs pass all rules.

St.Ack
